thread.section_title: AmericanFlags.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AmericanFlags.com | americanflags.com | 7 of 207
thread.title: Code

author: Code
title: Code
text:
I wanted my flags shipped by UPS only. There is no place on your web site for that request.
I can't call back to give extra money for shipping because your lines are always busy. I have tried
several times . No place on web site to correct error. My number is 361-244-4494 to get extra money.
I had a girl call one time and left a message that they do not keep my credit card number. Educate me.
